General.Name: Tande Co Ltd
General.Description: Tande Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate business in China. It is involved in the development and sale of real estate properties; and property management activities. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Xi'an, China. Tande Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xi'an Hi-tech Industry Development Zone Real Estate Development Company.
General.Address: Gaoxin International Business Center, Xi'an, China, 710075
